id.description: unique id of the accounting data delivery

creationDate.description: UTC date time when the accounting data delivery was created

startStatementPeriod.description: start of the sales period contained in the accounting (UTC)

endStatementPeriod.description: end of the sales period contained within this accounting (UTC)

id.description: accounting identifier (id of the accounting record)

accountedAmounts.description: list of values to be accounted within this transaction

timestamp.description: UTC date time of the timestamp when the transaction was made

contract.description: id of the sales contact used for this transaction defining the commission

bookedOfferId.description: booked offer id of the provider in case of an online booking

bookedOfferPartIds.description: booked offer part ids of the provider in case of an online booking

accountingReferenceIds.description: accounting ids that were provided in the bookingPart accountingRef in an online booking

ticketIds.description: ids of the tickets in case the provider is responsible for the ticket creation used in barcodes according to 90918-9

fulfillmentIds.description: OSDM fulfillment idsassociated with this accounting transaction

exchangedBookedOfferId.description: reference of the original booked offer that was exchanged in case of an exchange transaction

Subject.description: number and identification of the subject of accounting

fareId.description: if of the fare included in the accounting in case of OFFLINE sales in OSDM

dialogNumber.description: identification of the communication that caused the transaction e.g. the dialog number in the booking transaction according to IRS 90918-1.

train.description: train number in case the transaction involves one and only one train

travelDate.description: date of the first possible day of travel in the time zone where the travel starts.

countryOfSale.description: Country of the point of sale (ISO Country Code 2A)

bilateralTariffIdentifier.description: Identifier of a fare based on bilateral agreements. Both parties involved must agree on the content provided.

carriers.description: RICS code(s) of the carriers responsible for transportation.

retailer.description: RICS code of the retailing company. Commission rates might depend on the retailing company.

internationalJourney.description: Indication whether the accounted service is part of an international journey and therfore might have special conditions for VAT depending on national regulations

tripOrigin.description: Origin of the trip where th accounted item is part of. Encoding as urn, e.g. urn:uic:stn:8512345. Applicable if appropriate and needed.

tripDestination.description: Destination of the trip where th accounted item is part of. Encoding as urn, e.g. urn:uic:stn:8512345. Applicable if appropriate and needed.

grossAmount.description: indicates that the amount is the travel price. Note: one of grossAmount, refundFee and commission must be set to true

afterSaleFee.description: indicates that the value is a after sale fee (refund, exchange,...)

commission.description: indicates that the value is a commission

scale.description: Position of the decimal point default 2

commissionRate.description: percentage used for the calculation of the amount (e.g. in case of comissions)

commissionRateScale.description: scale (position of the decimal point) of the rate provided, default 2

PassengerType.description:
YOUNG_CHILD Young child – defined by the carrier depending on the age 
CHILD Child – defined by the carreir depending on the age  
YOUTH Youth – defined by the carreir depending on the age  
ADULT Adult – defined by the carreir depending on the age 
SENIOR Senior – defined by the carreir depending on the age  
FAMILY_CHILD Child associated with a family travellimng together  
ACCOMP_PRM Accompanying Person for PRM  
PRM_CHILD Handicapped young child accompanied by one person where the usual child according to the age price would be zero and the accompanying person would also be free   
WHEELCHAIR Passenger with wheelchair    
PERSON Used in requests together with date of birth   
PRM Person with reduced mobility – to be used in case of accompanying person or dog, date of birth must be provided additionally   
DOG A dog  
PET A pet  
LUGGAGE Oversize luggage 
BICYCLE A bicycle 
ACCOMP_DOG An accompagning dog for a PRM 
CAR A car for carcarriage trains 
MOTOCYCLE A motocycle for car carriage trains 
TRAILER A trailer for car carriage trains

PaymentType.description:
BCC Clearing (multilateral clearing) 
current account (eg EWT)
Bank transfer without BCC or current account clearing

SalesType.description: ONLINE: the transaction was an online booking bewteen the involved accounting parties OFFLINE: the sale was made based on fare data exchanged offline betewwn the accounting parties.

TransactionStandard.description: indication of a sale that is not following UIC sales standards, Default is UIC

TransactionType.description: type of the sales transaction accounted
